articles.description: Big Kat Bryant tried to step up as a leader during the 2020 season and has the option to play for the Tigers in 2021.
articles.content: ORLANDO, Florida–In the aftermath of Auburn’s 35-19 VRBO Citrus Bowl loss to the Northwestern Wildcats, Big Kat Bryant said he wasn’t certain if that contest was his finale playing football for the T… [+3023 chars]
